rule2.name: Invalid XML against schema
rule2.message: XML document is invalid against the schema.

rule3.name: Multiple BioProjects in a submission
rule3.message: Multiple BioProjects are referenced. Objects must reference single BioProject in a submission.

rule4.name: Invalid center name
rule4.message: Submission center name is not registered in the account.

rule5.name: Invalid laboratory name
rule5.message: Submission laboratory name is not registered in the account.

rule6.name: Invalid hold date
rule6.message: Hold date must be within two years.

rule7.name: Invalid submitter name
rule7.message: Submitter name is not registered in the account.

rule8.name: Invalid submitter e-mail address
rule8.message: Submitter e-mail address is not registered in the account.

rule9.name: Duplicate object names
rule9.message: Object name is already used in the account.

rule15.name: BioProject not found
rule15.message: Referenced BioProject is not found in the account.

rule16.name: BioSample not found
rule16.message: Referenced BioSample is not found in the account.

rule17.name: Experiment not found
rule17.message: Referenced Experiment is not found in the submitted objects.

rule19.name: Missing Insert size for paired library
rule19.message: Insert size (nominal length) is required for paired library.

rule20.name: Insert size too large
rule20.message: Insert size (nominal length) must be less than 10000000

rule23.name: Space in Run filename
rule23.message: Run filename contains space(s). Please remove space(s) in the filename.

rule24.name: Space in Analysis filename
rule24.message: Analysis filename contains space(s). Please remove space(s) in the filename.

rule25.name: Invalid Run file md5 checksum
rule25.message: Run file md5 checksum is invalid. Checksum must be 32 alphanumeric characters.

rule26.name: Invalid Analysis file md5 checksum
rule26.message: Analysis file md5 checksum is invalid. Checksum must be 32 alphanumeric characters.

rule27.name: One fastq file for paired library
rule27.message: In most cases, more than two fastq files per Run need to be registered for paired sequencing Experiment.

rule28.name: Invalid PacBio RS II hdf file series
rule28.message: A series of PacBio RS II hdf files, one bas and three bax files, must be registered per Run.

rule29.name: Invalid bam alignment file series
rule29.message: A series of bam alignment files, one bam | one reference mapping table | one reference fasta, must be registered per Run.

rule30.name: Invalid filetype
rule30.message: Filetype is not accepted or combination of sequencing platform and filetype is invalid.

rule31.name: Mixed filetype
rule31.message: Different filetypes are mixed in a Run.

rule32.name: Missing submission
rule32.message: Submission XML is required for submitting Experiment, Run and Analysis
